name.text: Chemistry sample question: Molar mass of elements

questiontext.text:
\(\require{mhchem}\) Calculate the molar mass of the following substance: \(\ce{@CN@}\).

[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]

generalfeedback.text:

In this question we calculate the molar mass of \(\ce{@CN@}\), and so need the data \[ {@tt@} \]

Molar mass of \(\ce{@CN@}\). \[ M= [[define _first='true'/]][[foreach ex='CL']][[if test='not _first']] + [[else]][[define _first='false'/]][[/if]] {@second(ex)@} \times {@dispsf(chem_data(first(ex),"AtomicMass"),3)@} \mathrm{g}\, \mathrm{mol}^{‚àí1} [[/foreach]] = {@stack_units_nums(ta1)@} \mathrm{g}\, \mathrm{mol}^{‚àí1}. \]
